name: Radiation Transport and Reactor Physics Research Group
body:
### Welcome to the Radiation Transport and Reactor Physics research group in the School of Nuclear Science and Engineering at Oregon State University!

#### Our PI is Todd Palmer and our group includes M.S. and Ph.D. students. We live in the Radiation Center on campus. Our current members are:

* Tony Alberti (@albeanth)
* Kyle Combs
* Jackson Harter (@harterj)
* Ben Lilley
* Lara Peguero
* Robert Schickler
* Doug Woods (@doubwoods3)

***
Our departmental website is [School of Nuclear Science and Engineering](http://ne.oregonstate.edu/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
